title: 怎么用指令清除一定空间内的方块
author: qq1260748785

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
fill x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2 air
xyz是对角坐标

replies.author: qq1260748785
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2017-5-13 21:27
fill x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2 air
xyz是对角坐标
需要什么插件吗
